instruction: Describe an example of how computers are used in education.
output: Computers have become increasingly important in education, from elementary schools to universities. They are used for studying, researching, writing papers, taking tests, tracking progress, and much more. For example, many classroom activities now utilize online learning platforms, such as video conferencing, virtual classrooms, and interactive whiteboards, to make learning more dynamic. Computers also allow for online collaboration with other students and teachers, allowing for more varied learning opportunities than ever before.
